confidenceScore.description: A score indicating the confidence level of the schema path suggestion, 1 for lowest, 100 for highest.

paths.description: List of path components (columns) from the left-hand schema to be used in the join.

tableFqn.description: The fully qualified name (FQN) of the left-hand table, always in this format: bigquery.googleapis.com/projects/[PROJECT_ID]/datasets/[DATASET_ID]/tables/[TABLE_ID]

leftSchemaPaths.description: Details for the left side of the suggested schema join.

paths.description: List of path components (columns) from the right-hand schema to be used in the join.

tableFqn.description: The fully qualified name (FQN) of the right-hand table, always in this format: bigquery.googleapis.com/projects/[PROJECT_ID]/datasets/[DATASET_ID]/tables/[TABLE_ID]

rightSchemaPaths.description: Details for the right side of the suggested schema join.

sources.description: The source(s) from which this suggestion originated (e.g., a Large Language Model).
